Key Match Events: Brayan Rocchio booted Alex Verdugo’s RBI grounder for an error in the 9th inning
Gleyber Torres followed with a run-scoring single in the 9th inning
Giancarlo Stanton hit a three-run homer
Juan Soto had a two-run, first-inning shot
Austin Wells also connected for the Yankees
Clase gave up back-to-back homers in the 8th inning of Game 3 but got bailed out when the Guardians hit two-run homers in the 9th and 10th
Tommy Kahnle threw 18 pitches, all changeups, to put away Cleveland in the 9th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Yankees manager Aaron Boone said, 'Not surprised with these guys'
Stephen Vogt, first-year manager of the Guardians, said, 'We’re going to show up ready to win'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees relievers struggled in high-leverage situations
The Guardians tied the score in the 8th when the Yankees botched an easy play in the infield
Bo Naylor doubled and moved up on an infield grounder
Mark Leiter Jr. got Steven Kwan to pop up
His low flip to first went through Anthony Rizzo’s legs for an error as Naylor scored
